headline: Lamb Weston Announces Inducement Award Under NYSE Listing Rule 303A.08
summary: EAGLE, Idaho, February 06, 2026--Lamb Weston Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: LW) announced today that on February 6, 2026, the company granted 317,647 restricted stock units and options covering an aggregate of 1,117,346 shares of the company's common stock (collectively, the "Inducement Awards") to Jan Craps. The company’s Compensation and Human Capital Committee approved the grant of Inducement Awards, made under the Lamb Weston Holdings, Inc. 2026 Inducement Stock Plan, to Mr. Craps as a material induc
